name: smart-automation
description: A client-ready website template with built-in automation workflows powered by n8n

scripts.build:
mkdir -p build && cp -r *.md *.html *.css *.js build/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Building static content...' && echo 'Smart Automation

Smart Automation

A client-ready website template with built-in automation workflows powered by n8n. Designed to help businesses capture leads, automate follow-ups, and grow smarter.

' > build/index.html
